Key Match Events: Jose Ramirez's bad-hop bouncer to third baseman Zach McKinstry was changed to an RBI double.
The Cleveland Guardians capitalized on the play to score five runs in the first inning and beat the Tigers 7-0.
Josh Naylor’s RBI single and Lane Thomas’s home run contributed to the Guardians' 5-0 lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Zach McKinstry took responsibility for the error and mentioned the irregular infield watering as a factor.
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch and players reflected on the remarkable finish to the 2024 season despite the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The scoring change added another earned run to the ledger of Tigers pitcher Tyler Holton.
The MLB Scoring Changes X account reported the updated ruling from Game 1.
